We refer to Wikipedia articles on astronomy for help. The process of refilling a gas tank involves connecting a hose to the gas cylinder and then pressurizing the system. A hissing sound indicates that the fuel is being transferred.

The answer is C: Proper seating requires aligning and firmly screwing the REFILL canister onto the valve so the nipple engages; once seated, you should hear a hiss.
